description: Submission of reflections on performance and achievements throughout the project, including clear logging of work activities and reflective commentary. Assessed on comprehensibility and usefulness of documentation.

Critical evaluation of scientific literature and evidence, identification of research gaps, and contextualization of findings. Requires 4000-word maximum report formatted for peer-reviewed publication standards.
Ongoing assessment of technical lab skills, equipment use, safety compliance, lab workbook maintenance, time management, and problem-solving abilities. Includes submission of lab books in week 11.
Week 9 presentation assessing comprehension, content organization, delivery skills, and visual aids. Presented to peers and supervisors with formative feedback provided.
